asteroids

Class Velocity

  • java.lang.Object
    • asteroids.Vector
      • asteroids.Velocity

  • public class Velocity
extends Vector
    A class of velocities involving an x-component, and an y-component, that is able to compute everything necessary to implement velocities.
    Version:
    0.0
    Author:
    Syd & Xavier

    • Constructor Summary

      Initializes this new velocity with a given x-component and y-component.

      Initialize this new position with a given vector

      • canHaveAsComponent

        @Basic
@Raw
public boolean canHaveAsComponent(double x)
        Checks whether the given component can be a component of this velocity.
        Overrides:
        canHaveAsComponent in class Vector
        Parameters:
        x - The given component.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given component is at most the speed of light | result = (Util.fuzzyLessThanOrEqualTo(x, getSpeedOfLight()) && super.canHaveAsComponent(x))
